ERROR_CREATING_RESERVATION: An error occurred while creating the reservation
ERROR_FETCHING_CLINIC_LIST: An error occurred while fetching the clinic list
ERROR_CREATING_CLINIC: An error occurred while creating the clinic
ERROR_FETCHING_RATINGS_LIST: An error occurred while fetching the ratings list

ERROR_FETCHING_CLINIC_DETAIL: An error occurred while fetching clinic details
